attributes.action: Give ILR to all immigrant front line workers in NHS irrespective of time in UK
attributes.additional_details: These people died in the cause and are ready to do so again. Mature nations always salute their heroes.
attributes.background: Government should think about honouring the people who served the nation by awarding them citizenship

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564809
